key.immersive_aircraft.multi_use: E hoʻohana i ke kope / hoʻonui ʻia
key.immersive_aircraft.fallback_use: E hoʻohana i ke kope / hoʻonui ʻia
item.immersive_aircraft.rotary_cannon.de: Kaʻa ʻāina ʻino e pili ana me ka poʻokela.
item.immersive_aircraft.bomb_bay.descrip: E hoʻokuʻu i TNT, ʻaʻole hoʻomāhapapa nā pā akā, e mālama i kā hōʻino.
item.immersive_aircraft.telescope.descri: He ʻano hou aku o ka mea ʻike.
item.immersive_aircraft.heavy_crossbow.d: He kā ʻīniha me ka mana koʻikoʻi, e manaʻolana i nā pulu.
item.immersive_aircraft.airship.descript: Airships may not be the fastest vehicle, but they sure are easy to maneuver.
item.immersive_aircraft.cargo_airship.de: Pili a me ke koho a me nā kumukūʻai, akā, e lawe ana i ke ʻano holoʻokoʻa.
item.immersive_aircraft.warship.descript: He mea paʻa lele, ʻākau, akā, ʻoi aku ka hoʻokomo ana.
item.immersive_aircraft.biplane.descript: Pau nō a me nā hana ma nā wahi kūpono. E nānā i ka wāwae o kāu ʻāina.
item.immersive_aircraft.gyrodyne.descrip: Who needs an engine if one could power the aircraft with pure brawn? Give it a good push and off it flies!
item.immersive_aircraft.quadrocopter.des: A masterwork of engineering! 4 rotors strapped to some bamboo. Perfect for building, and that's about it.
item.immersive_aircraft.bamboo_hopper.de: He mokupuni chonky me nā noho ʻekolu a me nā pontoon e noho ana i ke kai.
immersive_aircraft.gyrodyne_target_reach: I kapaʻa ka mīkini, ready for takeoff!
immersive_aircraft.invalid_dimension: O kēia kaʻa lāʻau, ʻaʻole i hana kēia ao.
immersive_aircraft.fuel.out: Ua ʻole ʻoe i ke kumu!
immersive_aircraft.fuel.low: ʻO nā poʻe e nānā ʻākoakoa!
immersive_aircraft.fat.out: E hoʻokaʻawale ʻoe i ke ʻai!
option.immersive_aircraft.separateCamera: E hoʻohana i kahi kiko camera ma nā moku lele.
option.immersive_aircraft.useThirdPerson: E mau i ka ʻili ʻekolu ma nā moku lele.
option.immersive_aircraft.windThunderWea: Ka makani ʻē aʻe i ka ʻū.
option.immersive_aircraft.repairExhausti: Ke kū ka mea pāʻani i kēlā ʻāpana.
option.immersive_aircraft.burnFuelInCrea: E ʻā i ke kumu ma ka koa kanaka.
option.immersive_aircraft.acceptVanillaF: E ʻolu i nā kuleana vanilla.
option.immersive_aircraft.useCustomKeybi: E hoʻohana i nā kiʻoni e komo, e loaʻa ka ʻike ʻole.
option.immersive_aircraft.showHotbarEngi: E hōʻike i ke koho hālikelike i ke pākī.
option.immersive_aircraft.enableCrashBlo: E hoʻomālamalama i ke kuhikuhi ʻino.
option.immersive_aircraft.enableCrashFir: E hoʻomālamalama i ke kuhikuhi ʻeha.
option.immersive_aircraft.crashExplosion: Ka nui o ke kuhikuhi ʻino.
option.immersive_aircraft.crashDamage: E hōʻino i ka mea pāʻani i ka ʻākena.
option.immersive_aircraft.preventKillThr: E nā hoʻi ʻo ia i ka mea hana i kekahi ʻākena.
option.immersive_aircraft.healthBarRow: E hoʻokuʻu i ke koho o nā kaʻa.
option.immersive_aircraft.damagePerHealt: Nā ʻano kiʻekiʻe e hoʻoluʻu i nā kaʻa.
option.immersive_aircraft.weaponsAreDest: E ʻoluʻolu i kekahi mau puʻupuʻu e hōʻole i nā pā.
option.immersive_aircraft.dropInventory: E hoʻokuʻu i ke kaʻina kūpono, ma ke ʻano e hoʻopaʻa iā ia i loko o ke mea lele.
option.immersive_aircraft.dropUpgrades: E hoʻokuʻu i nā hoʻomaikaʻi a me nā koho, ma ke ʻano e hoʻopaʻa iā ia i loko o ke mea lele.
option.immersive_aircraft.regenerateHeal: E hoʻonui ana i ke olakino i nā huli hoʻi, e hoʻoikaika ana i ka hana vanilla.
option.immersive_aircraft.requireShiftFo: E mālama i ka hoʻomaikaʻi i loaʻa ma ke kaʻina, ʻoi aku, e komo wale i ka mokupuni.
immersive_aircraft.tooltip.no_target: Pono e hoʻokumu i ke kumu!
